attributes.action: Stop Brexit remainers ignoring their constituents who voted leave
attributes.background: After 2 yrs  of wrangling the MP remainers  arnt listening to their constituents who voted to leave. Leave means leave , we told them WE want to leave , so take our word for it . Do what your constituents want and not what remain mps want

rejection.details:
How an MP votes would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You could ask your own MP to vote according to the result of referendum in your constituency. You can find out who your MP is and how to contact them here: 

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/mps/
